FHY application
=================
The purpose of this application is to allow the user submit personal data to each space. This means that each personal space will have his own folders and files. Using the application :ref:`FriendyControl <friendycontrol_index>` you can control who can watch your files.

The following links explains how the model was built:

* in :ref:`models <fhy_models>` you can find how the model was built,

* in :ref:`view <fhy_views>` you can find out how the views acts.

.. module:: fhy

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   fhy_models
   fhy_views
